reviews.review_msg: Great prof, extremely interesting topics & really good articles (no textbook) to supplement lecture material. However, EXAMS ARE HARD! Focus on studies/experiments/their results/the findings.. questions are very specfic about miniscule details!!

I took an upper level course with her - 391 culture and cognition. I also took 250 with her. I loved loved loved the culture and cognition course. She had people skype in to the class so we could ask them some questions about their papers. It was fun. There's also some teamwork. This is a really good class. Dr. B. makes the material exciting.
